title: Need help with client-twitter, How do I let eliza post images along with tweets??
body:
I am trying to create a twitter agent that does basic work like tweeting and replying to tweets, now how do I enable it to post/tweet images too???

Please help!!

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @Quanta-Naut! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!
